actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution providing for two additional student congressional interns for Members of the House of Representatives, the Resident Commissioner from Puerto Rico, and each delegate to the House.

summary.text: Authorizes each Member of the House of Representatives (including the Resident Commissioner from Puerto Rico and each Delegate to the House) to hire and pay not more than two additional student interns (to serve as such within or outside the District of Columbia).

titles.title: Resolution providing for two additional student congressional interns for Members of the House of Representatives, the Resident Commissioner from Puerto Rico, and each delegate to the House.
